comments.body: This is expected when the connection to the remote server could not be made.

fields.summary: Gridftp 5.2.5 ( with patch globus_ftp_control 4.8.3) and 6.0 still logging [0.0.0.0] when "Requesting Abort,  otherwise not seeing DEST=[0.0.0.0].

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:

otherwise not seeing DEST=[0.0.0.0].
